content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron plate production at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-80.0) 
-  BurnerInserter (position x=53.5, y=-78.5) that puts items into the furnace
-  BeltGroup that connects the inserter at position (x=53.5, y=-78.5) to the furnace at position (x=52.0, y=-80.0)

### Iron plate production at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=62.0, y=-54.0) 
-  BeltGroup with 7 belts that brings items to the furnace

### Storage at position(x=52.5, y=-82.5)
Consists of a Chest (position x=52.5, y=-82.5) that stores items


### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using inserter but the chest is full
-  Make sure the chest is not full before attempting to insert items into it
### Errors when using furnace but there are no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure there are ingredients to smelt in the furnace before attempting to smelt
### Errors when using furnace but the furnace fuel source is full
-  Make sure the furnace fuel source is not full before attempting to add more fuel


### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
-  Important variables that have been assigned:
  -  `transport-belt`: int
  -  `burner-inserter`: int
  -  `burner-mining-drill`: int
  -  `wood`: int
  -  `coal`: int
  -  `stone`: int
  -  `iron-ore`: int
  -  `iron-plate`: int
